description: Increasing length runs of consecutive composite numbers (endpoints).
references: Netnews group rec.puzzles, circa Mar 01 1996 (I would like to get the exact reference).
links: The rec.puzzles archive, Arithmetic Question 8 - consecutive.composites, The Math Forum
Usenet rec.puzzles Archive, Cons. Comp. Solution, June 2005
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Prime Gaps.
mathematica: maxGap = 1; Reap[ Do[ gap = Prime[n + 1] - (p = Prime[n]); If[gap > maxGap, Print[p + gap - 1]; Sow[p + gap - 1]; maxGap = gap], {n, 2, 10^8}]][[2, 1]] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jun 12 2013 *)
author: Mark Cramer (m.cramer(AT)qut.edu.au). Computed by Dennis Yelle (dennis(AT)netcom.com).
